title: AbstractInterpretation
description: The group of properties shared by different kinds of interpretations

OlderPossibleAge.title: OlderPossibleAge
OlderPossibleAge.description: Represents the older possible age for the interpretation. Expressed in geological time as millions of years [Ma], and the value must be positive. The age value is not subject to normalization.

YoungerPossibleAge.title: YoungerPossibleAge
YoungerPossibleAge.description: Represents the younger possible age for the interpretation. Expressed in geological time as millions of years [Ma], and the value must be positive. The age value is not subject to normalization.

DomainTypeID.title: DomainTypeID
DomainTypeID.description: Describes the domain of the interpretation: Depth, Time, Mixed

FeatureID.title: FeatureID
FeatureID.description: Reference to the Feature the Interpretation refers to. The actual type of the target is specified in the specialisation, i.e. the type, which includes this schema fragment.

FeatureName.title: FeatureName
FeatureName.description: Name of the feature the Interpretation refers to
